long_description: Lightweight and compressible, the REI Backpacker pillow gives you the comfort of goose down combined with the plumpness and durability of synthetic fill. Half-moon shape allows the pillow to be stuffed into the hood of mummy sleeping bag. Synthetic insulation core is surrounded by an outer layer of soft, goose down for resilience and loft. Sleeping side is a polyester/cotton blend for soft, moisture-wicking comfort; bottom is a durable nylon taffeta. Self-stowing zippered pocket provides compact size for travel; packed size is 7.5 x 6 x 3 in.
short_description: Lightweight and compressible, the REI Backpacker pillow gives you the comfort of goose down combined with the plumpness and durability of synthetic fill.
